name: 科技行銷
description: 英特爾的前任董事長及執行長曾經說過: “經由英特爾的工程師所主導開發的新產品，僅有百分之二十的機率可成功導入市場。”為什麼一向以創新領導科技雄霸處理器市場的英特爾公司，仍然無法保證其技術頂尖的研發團隊所開發的新產品，一定可以成功地進入市場呢? 本課程設計之內容即是以價值管理的角度，引導學生認識高科技市場及競爭之特性，並對於創新產品及尖端技術之商品化，提出一套系統性的知識架構。以使得學生未來在進入科技產業之後，對行銷高科技商品相關議題分析、策略發展及決策擬定，具備相對競爭優勢。
goals: 熟悉科技行銷之理論與實務
瞭解科技行銷的關鍵議題與相關解決方案
syllabus:
**Technology Marketing**

 Dr. Chia-Yang (Mac) Chang

The Course of Description

This course is about Technology Marketing for 3 hours per week. Students will present papers, cases, or book chapters of Technology Marketing in each class, mainly through the materials I choose. Discussion is the central core of this class. Graduated students need to elaborate on the argument of each article, case and book chapter. Furthermore, I encourage graduate students to interact with other students and me. Moreover, I will also assign individual assignments and team projects. Each team project assignment will be combined as their final project.

The Course of Objective

1.  Enabling students to understand the scope of Technology Marketing.
2.  Allowing students to know how to apply Technology Marketing knowledge in reality.
3.  Inspiring students’ creativity
